Lottery.arrangeRewards(uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x0c96d6eb32d5edd6e88cb8c582fee86707b55851-Lottery.sol#214-243) uses a weak PRNG: random % jackpotN == 0 (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x0c96d6eb32d5edd6e88cb8c582fee86707b55851-Lottery.sol#225)

Lottery.arrangeRewards(uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x0c96d6eb32d5edd6e88cb8c582fee86707b55851-Lottery.sol#214-243) uses a weak PRNG: ticketB == ticketA (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x0c96d6eb32d5edd6e88cb8c582fee86707b55851-Lottery.sol#232)

Lottery.arrangeRewards(uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x0c96d6eb32d5edd6e88cb8c582fee86707b55851-Lottery.sol#214-243) uses a weak PRNG: random % 2 == 0 (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x0c96d6eb32d5edd6e88cb8c582fee86707b55851-Lottery.sol#234)

HasRandom._random() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x0c96d6eb32d5edd6e88cb8c582fee86707b55851-Lottery.sol#17-28) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(msg.sender,_randomNonce ++,block.timestamp))) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x0c96d6eb32d5edd6e88cb8c582fee86707b55851-Lottery.sol#18-27)
